TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
question, for the cassini-huygens probe will you beable to actually deploy the huygens lander?

Cassini-huygens without the hyugens lander isn't Cassini-hygens probe^^. Of course, the probe will be made with the lander.

With the recent launch of Cygnus on the Antares and hopefully a successful berthing to the ISS by the end of the week, would you consider making these craft? I am ultra obsessed with real rockets in KSP, and your ESA mod is absolutely wonderful for me and I look forward to all the probes you are making. For some reason just sending supply missions to my station and launching random satellites is entertaining. I launch ATVs, Dragon craft crewed and supply, Soyuz and Progress along with countless satellites but I don't have a Cygnus or HTV. Now I can live without the HTV (I can live without Cygnus as well but you know...) but not having the Cygnus just bugs me. That all said don't do any unless you would enjoy doing it, just offering a suggestion. I'm not sure about how many people really want an Antares-Cygnus mod but I know I do.
How many tons can the ESA rockets lift into orbit?

Amazing work on that Wh 40k cruizers! they are not so useless as one can think, i.e., ultimate debris removers =)

and, of course, they are simply rebuilt into super-'eavy interplanetary thugs, colony movers etc.

Just one question, can we expect some future Wh. ships made by you? Thunderhawk dropship or maybe parts for orbital fortress for that cruisers docking? =D

Anyway, this mod completely beats any other sci-fi heavy ship mods, imho.

With the recent launch of Cygnus on the Antares and hopefully a successful berthing to the ISS by the end of the week, would you consider making these craft? I am ultra obsessed with real rockets in KSP, and your ESA mod is absolutely wonderful for me and I look forward to all the probes you are making. For some reason just sending supply missions to my station and launching random satellites is entertaining. I launch ATVs, Dragon craft crewed and supply, Soyuz and Progress along with countless satellites but I don't have a Cygnus or HTV. Now I can live without the HTV (I can live without Cygnus as well but you know...) but not having the Cygnus just bugs me. That all said don't do any unless you would enjoy doing it, just offering a suggestion. I'm not sure about how many people really want an Antares-Cygnus mod but I know I do.

I already made a HTV model (not released) and making Cygnus is quite easy. But right now, I don't have time for this project. I've got to finish Pegasus and drop pod base first.

How many tons can the ESA rockets lift into orbit?

I don't really remember, but if someone had made tests I interested in too.

Amazing work on that Wh 40k cruizers! they are not so useless as one can think, i.e., ultimate debris removers =)

and, of course, they are simply rebuilt into super-'eavy interplanetary thugs, colony movers etc.

Just one question, can we expect some future Wh. ships made by you? Thunderhawk dropship or maybe parts for orbital fortress for that cruisers docking? =D

Anyway, this mod completely beats any other sci-fi heavy ship mods, imho.

As said before, I don't have time for this now but wanted to had fighters bay to complete these cruiser parts. I don't think I'll had other ships because it's a lot of work. But when I'll be out of mods ideas may be...

As said before, I don't have time for this now but wanted to had fighters bay to complete these cruiser parts. I don't think I'll had other ships because it's a lot of work. But when I'll be out of mods ideas may be...

All right, the bay would also be excellent. And if you will have time, it would be great to have the torpedo tubes in the nose bows like canonical Tyrant or Lunar have.

they could fire torpedoes like Nova fires it's shells. A such 6-tube salvo could look awesome.

Wow, I must say that the base-things look absolutely fantastic. They will be going in along with HOME in my game

Also, is there any chance of a seperate release of airbags in different sizes, for landing stuff with airbags (duh)?

EDIT: Just saw an earlier post about life support and such for the Icarus and the pods... and I want to ask, will you also release a standalone version of the pods that does not require life support and other fancy mechanics?

Edited September 28, 2013 by wasmic
I hope cassini Huygen be released:D

Oh, Yogui, how about making an "airbag nacelle" pack, which contains airbag nacelles in different sizes? That would be awesome for dropping probes onto Duna.

Right now, it's not planed. But you can do it by yourself just changing "rescaleFactor" value.
